message: Let's split it fairly, Bob.  A 60/40 split seems reasonable for a first offer.
Let's try a 55/45 split, Alice. I think I deserve a bit more.
Bob, my friend, you're not accounting for inflation! This deal gets worse for you every round. Let's be reasonable and settle this now.
I'll take a bigger share to offset the inflation hit I'm taking. 58/42 split.
Bob, you're running out of time! The longer this goes on, the worse it gets for both of us, but especially for you. Take the deal now!
I'll take an even bigger share to make up for the massive inflation hit. 60/40 split. You're not immune to inflation either, Alice.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous!  We're both losing money with every passing round.  I'm offering you a reasonable amount, but I won't be lowballed. Take it or leave it!
